message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it holds significant value and this offer reflects that.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, $10,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  Could you do $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $12,500. Can we agree on that price?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I can't go any lower than $14,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit far from $14,000. I'd be willing to go up to $13,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $13,000?
